last_episode_to_air.name: Love Forever
last_episode_to_air.overview: How do you deal with the loss of a loved one? Does love last forever? Find out in this episode of Cutting Pyaar which talks about love, life, death and small surprises..

name: Cutting Pyaar
overview: Cutting Pyaar is a series of love stories revolving around love and how different people view love and relationships.
